Installing a Centos6 VM for HDP or CDH

This post will get you started on installing Centos 6 on your VM. At the time of this writing, most companies are using either RHEL6/Centos6 or RHEL7/Centos7 for their data clusters with the majority still on version 6 to stay with the older more stable version.
